Q_DESC:
Create a class called Hello. Include a function named speak that accepts 2 string arguments and its return type is void. The first argument is the name of the person and the second argument is the name of the course. Print a welcome message in this method. 

In the main function create an object of type Hello and the object invokes the function speak().

Input and Output Format : 

Refer sample input and output for formatting specifications. 

All text in bold corresponds to the input and the rest corresponds to output.
TESTCASE_1:
PUNITHA  C++
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Hello PUNITHA ! Welcome to C++ Programming !
TESTCASE_2:
SURAJ JAVA
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Hello SURAJ ! Welcome to JAVA Programming !
